Cowgirl Hat (White, F)
Female01_Hat_cowboy_01_description
A sturdy white hat with a wide, upturned brim that protects the face from the sun and rain. Was once used to even hold water.[#Legal]
Un chapeau rigide à bords larges et remontés, protégeant le visage du soleil et de la pluie. Fut même utilisé pour retenir l'eau.[#Legal]
Ein robuster, weißer Hut mit einer hochgeknickter Krempe, die das Gesicht vor der Sonne und Regen schützt. Wurde einmal genutzt, um sogar Wasser zu sammeln.[#Legal]
Cappellone bianco con un'ampia tesa in grado di proteggere il viso dai raggi del sole e dalla pioggia. Un tempo usato anche per attingere acqua.[#Legal]
Un sólido sombrero blanco con ala ancha y doblada que protege la cara del sol y de la lluvia. Antaño se utilizaba incluso como recipiente de agua.[#Legal]
幅広で反り返ったつばのある、丈夫な白い帽子。日差しや雨を避けるだけでなく、水を汲むのにも使われていた。[#Legal]
폭이 넓고 휘어진 차양이 있는 튼튼한 화이트 칼라의 모자. 햇볕이나 비를 피하는 것뿐만 아니라 물을 긷는 용도로도 사용되고 있다. [#Legal]
A sturdy white hat with a wide, folded brim. On top of blocking the sun and providing cover from rain, they were also used to scoop water.[#Legal]
兩端帽簷大幅度上翻、堅固的白色帽子。不只可以遮陽遮雨、還可以拿來接水。[#Legal]
兩端帽簷大幅度上翻、堅固的白色帽子。不只可以遮陽遮雨、還可以拿來接水。[#Legal]
A sturdy white hat with a wide, upturned brim that protects the face from the sun and rain. Was once used to even hold water.[#Legal]
